item.description:
Hi everyone,
WE now have a waiting list for Thanksgiving dinner at my condo in Wethersfield. I am limited to 19 people. Please bring a folding chair and wine or beer to share.

The menu is chips and dip, veggies and dip, cheese and crackers, pumpkin black bean soup, turkey/gravy, mashed potatoes, stuffing, corn, peas, butternut squash, sweet potato, green bean salad, rolls, peach pie, pumpkin pie, pecan pie, chocolate pie, ice cream.

I have to work early Friday so this dinner will run until about 8pm.

OK to bring Board games and the tv will have football -

Nancy
my cell is 5083803737 soulpart@aol.com

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Thanksgiving at Nancy's in Wethersfield
